bestIdea.name: The Enchanted Forest of Narnia
bestIdea.description: Journey through the magical land of Narnia, where mythical creatures roam and the landscape is ever-changing with enchantment. Follow the path from the wardrobe to the majestic Cair Paravel.

otherIdeas.name: The Yellow Brick Road to Oz
otherIdeas.description: Follow the iconic Yellow Brick Road through the magical land of Oz, encountering whimsical characters and enchanting landscapes on the way to the Emerald City.

otherIdeas.name: The Fairy Tale Road of Grimm
otherIdeas.description: Travel through the world of Grimm's Fairy Tales, where each step takes you deeper into a land of classic stories and magical adventures.

possibleSteps.startingLocation: The Village of Hansel and Gretel

possibleSteps.endingLocation: The Forest of Little Red Riding Hood

possibleSteps.startingLocation: The Forest of Little Red Riding Hood
